Class Boss

    • groupproject.Entity
      • groupproject.Moby

          • groupproject.Boss
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Shopkeeper

    public class Boss
extends Enemy
    Describes a Boss Extension of Enemy

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addProjectile(double angle)
      Adds a projectile at a given angle with current ranged properties
      void ai()
      Ai method for enemy, called every frame Find player's position, moves to within range of player and then performs attack when in range
      void changeWeapon(java.lang.String name)
      Changes weapon to weapon with corresponding name from projectiles
      void dash()
      Locks boss normal movement and causes the boss to gain a burst of speed
      void endDash()
      Ends the current dash returning control
      int getAttackCounter()
      Gets the counter used for determining which attack the boss should use
      int getCurrentAttack()
      Gets the current attack number
      java.lang.String getCurrentAttackType()
      Gets the current type of attack
      int getHealthMax()
      Gets max health of boss
      void kill()
      Kills the enemy dropping an item and checking if doors should open
      void ranged()
      Performs a ranged attack if the counter is 0, ignores ammo and is reduced by enemy firerate multiplier
      void scaleBoss()
      Scales the health and damage of the boss by the multipliers in enemies.csv
      void setAttackCounter(int attackCounter)
      Sets the counter used for determining which attack the boss should use
      void setCurrentAttack(int currentAttack)
      Sets the current attack number
      void setCurrentAttackType(java.lang.String currentAttackType)
      Sets the current attack type
      void setHealthMax(int healthMax)
      Sets max health of boss
